pros: Looks more expensive than it is with its white marble base
Included spare wires are a nice bonus for when you break a wire
cons: Some users note they had to adjust the arm slightly so that the wire slides into the groove when cutting

customer_reviews.title: I cannot recommend this product.  May need recall.
customer_reviews.text: The design and idea is great BUT . . . . . . when I opened the package, the screw that holds the blade in place was loose in the package. WHY? Because where that screw hold the blade, is not threaded. I am debating on whether I want to fix it or send it back. I could fix it with JB Weld. I hope Amazon examines a few of these!!! That loose blade is a liability to Amazon in the long run.
customer_reviews.author: JMikeC - DFW

customer_reviews.title: It looks nice, and we'll keep it around though
customer_reviews.text: The marble is chipped and is fairly brittle (read: there is a lot of marble dust from this thing). It looks nice, and we'll keep it around though. The wire replacements are way overpriced, so we bought steel wire from our local hardware store in the same gauge to save tons of money.
customer_reviews.author: Jon B

customer_reviews.title: Not good.  Save your money.
customer_reviews.text: This did not work. Slicing the cheese block was very difficult and would bend the blade of the unit. It was easier for me to use a knife. I did return this for a refund. The quality was not very good. Save your money
customer_reviews.author: Gimilzor

customer_reviews.title: I love the look and idea!
customer_reviews.text: Came in good time and looked as expected, except the wire was broken on receipt. Gladly, there are 2 extra wires that come with the product. Since I had to replace the wire, I found that the directions are not correct that come with the green version. The wire cannot go below the channel (it is too short) and has to be on top of the channel. If you look at the box, this is what it looks like and I watched a YouTube video. However, even with the wire on top, I cannot get the handle to be perpendicular as shown in the picture. If I am missing something, please let me know!
customer_reviews.author: JBro

customer_reviews.title: cutting wire is very delicate
customer_reviews.text: This is very pretty, but was a disappointment to use. The handle has to swing all the way back and lay on the table or board if you need two hands to position the cheese. I was using a firm block of cheddar; the first cut was perfect, but the second one snapped the wire. It does come with 3 replacement wires, but I didn't bother and sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Carol A.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean and attractive on a table or serving ...
customer_reviews.text: A satisfactory tool. Could use a guide bar to hold cheese in line with cutting wire. Smooth surface causes cheese block to stick to surface when advancing to next cut. Fairly heavy, stays put on table, could damage table or counter if dropped. Easy to clean and attractive on a table or serving area. Design allows cutting large blocks into smaller pieces for storage.
customer_reviews.author: John Barry

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work and is a weak blade.
customer_reviews.text: This was a very disappointing purchase. Very weak blade, doesn’t cut straight or easy. It sounded like a good idea but would stick with a knife for the hard cheeses. We use parmesan 5 times a weak and this is worthless to cut it. Live and Lear’s. Don’t waste you money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I bought this because I was tired of the wire ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I was tired of the wire slicer's breaking, however the blade on this item is to thick. It crumbles instead of slices the cheese. I will go to a wire cutter next time.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Parks

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for cheese lovers
customer_reviews.text: I Love this. It's light, compact, and no more worries about breaking the wire when cutting a strip of hard cheese like my favorite sharp cheddar. I'm going to buy one for my sister since she loves cheese as much as I do and she goes through a couple of slicers a year, just like i did. Never again. Easy to use, easy to wash. Love this!!!
customer_reviews.author: d e

customer_reviews.title: RSVP Cheese Slicer
customer_reviews.text: This is so much easier than slicing cheese with a knife! When the wire broke (my fault, I knocked the slicer off the drain board and into the sink), I could not figure out how to replace the wire. Internet to the rescue. This video made it super easy (though I recommend positioning the wire so that it is below the line of the handle, rather than above it, as seems to be the case in the video):
customer_reviews.author: Susan K.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT.. This product came broken and I just found out that it is not returnable. The wire for cutting snapped. It is very thin so not surprising.
customer_reviews.author: Desirae Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother. All 3 wires broke
customer_reviews.text: This product looks nice, but I'm very disappointed in its durability. It came with three wires for cutting cheese. The first was installed for shipping, and it arrived snapped in two. I installed the second one, and after using it two or three times, it came unwound. After letting it sit on the counter for two weeks unused, I installed the third wire. Wondering if I had it too tight before, I tightened so it was barely taut enough to slice through the cheese. After using three times, it came unwound too. Don't bother.
customer_reviews.author: James B. Stump

customer_reviews.title: Broken upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived with the installed cutting wire snapped. Fortunately they give you two spare lines which are taped to the bottom of the slicer. Next issue was getting the arm aligned since it was bent out of place causing the slicer to drop at a 15 degree angle and out of line with the cutting slot. I bent it into place and tightened the new line, however, it seems like something I'll have to do fairly frequently. The marble is beautiful. Cleaning it is fairly simple. It does attract quite a bit of cheese in the cutting slot, though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good idea, bad execution
customer_reviews.text: The overall design is very good. The problem that is readily apparent is that the blade is inadequate for hard cheese. The blade should have been made of a heavier gauge metal so that it doesn't wiggle when cutting cheese. A heavier blade would also make for straighter cuts.
customer_reviews.author: william mueller

customer_reviews.title: Game changer
customer_reviews.text: The first month i had this product it had completely revolutionized my experience slicing cheese. It is infinitely better than slicing by hand. However, as time has gone by I do see some flaws. First, it is fragile and was delivered broken at first. and secondly the slicing arm is wobbly which means it can be hard to slice directly through the cheese. Also the slit the slicer rests in is a little awkward to clean because it is narrow and deep but manageable.
customer_reviews.author: Erick

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I love the marble base & it works very nicely. However , when I received it, it had a broken rubber leg. I would’ve sent it back but the shipping was too much. I’ve tried to glue it back on but it keeps falling off. I’ll try gorilla glue next & hopefully that will do it. Vicki Roppe
customer_reviews.author: Vicki M. Roppe

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with broken wire
customer_reviews.text: The wire strung on the marble cheese slicer was broken when I opened the box. I almost returned it. Since it comes with 2 extra wires, I was able to replace it, but now have only one backup! I would like the company to send me more replacement wires. Is anyone listening?
customer_reviews.author: Di-zee

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to a kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It cuts hard and soft cheese. I've even cut Velveeta 1/16 of an inch thick. Some people mentioned the wire breaking, I think it's operator error. it will only cut hard cheese so fast you have to give it time to work. the only thing I didn't like about it was the packaging, it came with a broken wire, I think that has to do with the way it was packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Nice small size.
customer_reviews.text: This one replace another one I had just like it. It has tiny button feet it sits on and those all came off on the first one but we just used it without them....no problem. You may be able to super glue them back on. We take it in the car with us for snacking on the road. I ordered a new one because all the wires broke and I didn't know you could buy new wires for it. This is a great little slicer and works well. You have to get the screwing-in knob turned the correct way or the wire keeps coming loose.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Cut the Cheese
customer_reviews.text: All cutting the cheese jokes aside... this cutter does a great job on small cheeses. If you have Costco-size cheeses to cut, however, it will not fit. Also, not sure if there is a remedy for this, but it makes a mess underneath the cutter with all kinds of cheesy chards.
customer_reviews.author: Aggron3

customer_reviews.title: Not better or easier than a knife.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this but the first wire came broken in the box and the second wire didn't make it through 1 block of cheddar before loosening up and breaking. I finished off the block of cheese with a knife and realized that the line cut into the marble for the wire to seat below grade gets filled with cheese and needs to be cleaned out, so I had to clean both this device and the knife that I ended up using to finish the job. Going through wires this fast isn't worth the price, especially when you need to use a knife too.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Masliah

customer_reviews.title: Ok cheese cutter but mine was a little uneven.
customer_reviews.text: My cutter doesn’t really look leveled. Since it’s not flushed all the way, it can be hard to store away when you have not too much room. It will cut chees ok and has two extra blades. The quality was just sub par for me though.
customer_reviews.author: Hung

customer_reviews.title: Fortunately it comes with two extra wires and was quickly ...
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I gave it four stars was because it arrived with the wire broken. It really wasn't very well protected in its packaging. Fortunately it comes with two extra wires and was quickly and easily repaired. Very nice looking and good price. .
customer_reviews.author: Manny T F

customer_reviews.title: Works and looks nice
customer_reviews.text: It does a good job, especially at slicing soft cheeses where a knife often gets stuck. I appreciate the inclusion of 2 extra wires, because that's what killed my old slicer. While I just use it for everyday, the marble appearance makes it nice for parties too.
customer_reviews.author: T. Rathburn

customer_reviews.title: Good Design
customer_reviews.text: For cutting regular cheddar cheese, wire is better, but it's fragile and hard to replace. This sturdy steel cheese slicer requires a bit more force and the cut isn't as sharp, but basically it does a fine job and is easy to clean. I like the design both for both looks and practicality, was very happy to find it, and would not go back to wire. Update: Since the blade is so strong, all kinds of things can be sliced with it, such as cake, tomatoes, avocados, etc. I've taken to using it instead of a knife because it provides its own cutting area and can be rinsed off easily.
customer_reviews.author: MysteryAuthor

customer_reviews.title: Broken upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: Arrived broken. The wire was snapped. Was unable to return when I tried.
customer_reviews.author: Kit

customer_reviews.title: Great Value that Works!
customer_reviews.text: I have enjoyed using this cheese cutter so much that I bought two extras for my RV and as a gift. Solid, heavy base. Using a wire or super-thin blade like this is the best way to cut most any type of cheese.
customer_reviews.author: Guy O.

customer_reviews.title: It comes with 2 extra wires and is beautiful marble
customer_reviews.text: I ordered it yesterday and got it delivered to me today Sunday Sept 27, 2020. How did they do it? Wow. Nice looking and effective cheese cutter. Reasonable price for sure.
customer_reviews.author: James King

customer_reviews.title: Nice Cheese Slicer
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is a nice product. The wire does not lay into the cutout groove at the end but it cuts nice and the marble looks good so it is a keeper since it is only for personal use. It also comes with 2 additional wires under the cutting block so that was a nice surprise. The wire alignment may not be on all their shipments but for me it was.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Empringham

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Received broken and impossible to fix or put new wire on. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Penny J Boss

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, solid and works great!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Had a handheld wire cheese cutter for so many years the aluminum handle started degrading and leaving metal on my hands. It's hard to find a replacement wire cutter and the three non-wire cheese cutters I tried were terrible. I bought 6 extra wires and taped them to the bottom of this one, thinking I'd need them, but have had for a couple years and haven't broken one yet. Very pretty and super high quality. Great housewarming gift.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Eastman

customer_reviews.title: Should have done more research
customer_reviews.text: Bought this so i would have to keep cutting cheese for my kids. We had similiar devices when i was growing up and they worked perfectly. Quality has gone down as time has passed. The blade enters the cheese just fine, but the blade bends outward as it slides through. almost impossible to get a full slice of cheese. This may work great for small bricks of soft cheese; if is TERRRIBLE for 2-lb bricks of cheddar
customer_reviews.author: Kristopher Geelan

customer_reviews.title: make sure that you align the wire correctly
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be as advertised, however, I had to immediately use one of the 2 "Spare" cutter wires as the original was already broken, so you really have only 1 spare
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Hites

customer_reviews.title: It cut through nice and didn't get caught up on anything and the ...
customer_reviews.text: After reading some of the reviews, I was hesitant to buy this. BUT I decided to order it anyway and take my chance. Well, it arrived fast and in tact. No broken wire and no broken handle. The two extra wires are taped to the bottom of the marble. I immediately put it to work. I had bought a Costco size block cheddar cheese and placed it on the block. It cut through nice and didn't get caught up on anything and the wire didn't' bend or come loose. I've used it three times since I received it 3 days ago. I'm glad I made the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: B. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Does not cut all the wat through!
customer_reviews.text: Useless. The groove on the base is too shallow and since the wire warps when cutting, it will not cut through the cheese entirely. Looking for the box now to return.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Monell

customer_reviews.title: Great Cheese Slicer
customer_reviews.text: Did not have another cheese slicer in the house and was just using regular kitchen knives to slice blocks of cheese before purchasing this slicer. It's been a great addition to our kitchen gadgets and slices very easily. I have also been impressed by how easy it is to clean. It comes with extra wires, which is very convenient for replacing them when they wear out. Would recommend it to anyone who is looking for a cheese slicer.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Calderone

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift because it terrified me watching my mother in-law cut cheese with a knife. She said she could never get one to last because the wire always breaks, so I found her this and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Kassidy Sisk

customer_reviews.title: Inspect upon opening and make sure that the cutting wire is properly installed.
customer_reviews.text: A great product. (After repair). I ordered two. BOTH had the cutting wire IMPROPERLY INSTALLED out of the box. One was already broken and the second one would likely have failed during first use. The wires were routed around the support arm instead of around the grooved spindle connected to the handle. Properly assembled; these are great cutters. Sanitary, handy and with two spare wires taped under the marble cutting block, they will last years and years.
customer_reviews.author: luvern witty

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, but.....
customer_reviews.text: Like what i read from a lot of customer reviews, this came with a broken wire. Makes me concerned if the wires are not durable, as they supplied 2 replacements. So, I'm not very happy with that.... I will be returning it and buy one made of wood, hope to be luckier. But I still gave it a 3-star overall rating because it is a good looking product and marble is good material for it.
customer_reviews.author: Florence A Garbanzos

customer_reviews.title: Will not work on large blocks of cheese
customer_reviews.text: Large blocks of cheese can not be cut using this product. You have to cut larger cheese blocks down to then slice cheese.
customer_reviews.author: D&T

customer_reviews.title: Definitely would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: This works really well, looks nice, and is durable stainless. I like it and would reorder another if needed for gifting.
customer_reviews.author: Mona Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with a broken wire, but there were 2 spares
customer_reviews.text: Slicer arrived with a broken wire, no return label, and no information about refunds or exchanges. It did have 2 spare wires taped to the bottom of the marble slab, however. (I didn't notice them at first.) Assembly is very simple, with loose tolerances. It was easy to figure out how to replace the broken wire. I've used the slicer several times a week for a few months now. It works well & there haven't been any more broken wires. All things considered, not bad for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Grandpa

customer_reviews.title: Clean Cutting and NOT Made in China
customer_reviews.text: I liked everything about this sturdy Cheese Cutter! Made in Taiwan solid heavy base that appears to be real marble and not a surface that will scratch, sturdy cutting wire with 2 spare wires. Nice product!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Marion

customer_reviews.title: This product is extremely flimsy. Right out of the ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is extremely flimsy. Right out of the box the handle was loose. Then at first use, the wire snapped ... while cutting into SOFT cheese. I’d return and never buy again, but Returns are not available for this item. No bueno!
customer_reviews.author: C Atterbury

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: does NOT slice easily... cheese slides around and blade doesn't slice straight down! Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Island Girl

customer_reviews.title: It cuts the cheese, and more
customer_reviews.text: From its elegant lines, to its sheer heft, you will be amazed by its quality. It will slice any cheese softer than a brick. If you have cheese that is brick-hard, use the cheese slicer like a 3lb. cheese smasher either way, you can’t go wrong...unless you knock it off the counter onto your foot.
customer_reviews.author: hank mcspanky

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Marble
customer_reviews.text: Such a pretty marble finish. Love using this for hosting parties. Cuts cheese good and nd easy to clean. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany K

customer_reviews.title: Not helpful
customer_reviews.text: At least there's no wire to break. But it doesn't slice an even bit of cheese. Knife works the same and is easier to clean. Would be better if it had a guide to hold the cheese in place
customer_reviews.author: GR

customer_reviews.title: Don't expect any help from the manufacturer. Faulty wires were not replaced on request.
customer_reviews.text: I wrote an earlier review that was unfavorable, but now I understand that the company never got my request for more cutting wires. Now I know that once they connected with me for the first time actually they were wonderfully cordial and have sent wires ASAP to me. They can be highly recommended and I am a happy customer! Henry Thomas
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer, Henry Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great for Cheese lovers!
customer_reviews.text: This cheese slicer makes cutting cheese, a breeze! Its sturdy and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Works Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Make short work of soft cheeses like mozzarella. Nice marble board and it is dishwasher safe. Best part is the two extra cutter wires in case you break the original.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Behrent

customer_reviews.title: Delicate and Decorative Cheese Slicer
customer_reviews.text: This cheese slicer is very pretty and looks good on a table. It does slice well but the cutting wire is a bit delicate so you have to be careful when you clean it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: Weak wires
customer_reviews.text: The wire that was supposed to come attached was broken. I was glad there was a spare but it was very difficult to get on and it still doesn't sit right. I don't know if the wire is two bit too short or what.
customer_reviews.author: Private

customer_reviews.title: Easy slicer
customer_reviews.text: Love this cheese slicer already had one for one home needed another for 2 Nd home
customer_reviews.author: maryba

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful stone design.  Perfect for small parties.
customer_reviews.text: My husband wanted a stone cheese slicer and this one fit the bill. It's the perfect size for cutting a block of cheese. I always have problems with cheese knives, so I am grateful for this product. I chose to hand wash this only since it's made of marble.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my husband, who constantly complained about other cheese slicers. The best part is that putting in a new wire is easy. Don't push down too quickly - it's for cheese.
customer_reviews.author: K. Prager

customer_reviews.title: So far so good but came with a broken wire.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the used one--"like brand new" but it came with a broken wire...good thing there were two spare ones taped under it. Hopefully those two last.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Ok but won’t buy again
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with broken cutting wire but came with extras but they will break again. I won’t buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Ron H.

customer_reviews.title: We love these!
customer_reviews.text: We love these!! As an italian family we eat a lot of cheese with EVERY meal. My fiances mother and sister have one of these and I loved it so much we bought one for our house.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Archer

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift Idea
customer_reviews.text: Love this slicer. Best one I've ever used. And I own an electric Deli/cheese slicer that doesn't cut as smooth as this little wire design. Had mine for 5 years and just put the 3rd wire on. (It came with two spares) So I ordered replacement wires because I dont want to be stuck without this thing. Then started buying them as gifts for the family. Now everybody has one sitting on their counters. HIGHLY recommend.
customer_reviews.author: PASSTHEAMMO

customer_reviews.title: A O.K
customer_reviews.text: Great for multiple slices. Slices well. Not the easiest to store because the handle sticks out beyond the marble board. You need to use a brush to clean the grove in the board, the marble cleans easily.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D. Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: This item is smaller and more lightweight than I anticipated. The blade did not appear to be able to cut through even medium size blocks of cheese. Pushes the cheese away and makes the slices uneven
customer_reviews.author: Marci

customer_reviews.title: Great slicer, but don't push it!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, great price, great vendor=Great DEAL! I like this slicer. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars? The wire broke on my first slice. I don't believe I was forcing it.. it just came unraveled, and it's not easy to twist it back together. Now I am using it Veeeeery carefully with literally no pressure, and it works just fine. I can get some insanely thin slices with it.
customer_reviews.author: JD Jones

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love my cheese cutter, I lost my other one to my daughter in law.
customer_reviews.author: Ronda Middleton

customer_reviews.title: Darn fine slicer
customer_reviews.text: Shopped around in the stores and could not find a quality slicer such as this one. Simple to use and clean. Heavy enough not to move around when slicing. Comes with spare wires when replacement is needed. Quick delivery. Nice to have for party prep or to have others slice their own. From thick to thin slices, all thw way down to the bottom, since the marble is grooved out, allowing the wire to cleanly slice thru the cheese.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this cutter
customer_reviews.text: Pretty happy with this cutter. It cleans up easy and cut cheese with ease. I do wish there was some sort of stop/guide to keep slices uniform but that’s just me
customer_reviews.author: loreen richards

customer_reviews.title: Yuck!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy! Wire was broken and the “marble” near the cutting site was all crumbling apart. Think crumbled up walked on rock salt used to melt ice on your sidewalks. I don’t want that in my food yuck! Cheaply made! I’m gonna pay the extra few bucks and go for a wooden one instead!
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Can cut my size slices
customer_reviews.text: Seems to cut easily. Wanted to be able to cut what size slice I wanted. Many cheeses are only in chunk style
customer_reviews.author: Marie Arlene Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean and small enough to put in a drawer
customer_reviews.author: Honest Review

customer_reviews.title: Easy enough to use that our 2 year old can do it!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this so that our kids could be more involved in the kitchen and more self sufficient. It cuts small blocks of cheese easily enough that our two year old can use it independently without difficulties (with supervision just in case), which is pretty remarkable. Meets all of our needs, easy to use, nice and heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Mcdonnell

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Design, but Blade Cutting Ability questioned
customer_reviews.text: I think the quality of the stainless steel and rubber feat are great in this cheese cutter, but the blade perhaps is too thick (a little thinner than a steak knife) causing harder cheeses to not cut properly, and often cruble. The cheeses it does cut, the blade always curves to the outside of the block, cutting wedge pieces and not cutting straight down. I think the blade needs to be replaced with a mandalay-sharp knife.
customer_reviews.author: Host47

customer_reviews.title: Wobbly but effective
customer_reviews.text: I have been slicing sliced soft and medium cheeses with minimal difficulty almost daily for months. The handle is mounted somewhat loosely and it can be slightly difficult to guide the wire into the slit in the granite for a complete cut (I think that missing the slit could easily break the wire). It comes with a few replacement wires taped to the bottom. The wire is easy to replace as I found out when the original wire broke on my first cut. I don't know if this was my fault or if my own wire installation was somehow better than the factory's, but I have had not trouble since.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Baker

customer_reviews.title: Damaged product
customer_reviews.text: Box was dented and wire was broken. Would be nice to get a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Jacques

customer_reviews.title: It is okay
customer_reviews.text: I think this would be a nice cheese sliver if the wire was a bit more durable, mine actually came broken already but it comes with two extra wires! We put a new wire on and it seems to work okay, the wire doesn’t seem very tight - probably wouldn’t buy again.
customer_reviews.author: jessa

customer_reviews.title: Blade bent on cheddar cheese
customer_reviews.text: The blade bent the first time I used it on a block of cheddar cheese.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Varner

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: My niece LOVES this slicer. Bought her one 2 years ago when she admired mine. Sister swiped it. Of course, Auntir bought her another. Loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Fran CW

customer_reviews.title: Terrible!!
customer_reviews.text: Several chips in the marble. Nothing like marble in your cheese.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Janety

customer_reviews.title: Great cheese slicer and pretty too
customer_reviews.text: I love this cheese board for cutting even thin slices of cheese. It’s my second one that I purchased
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied customer

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind for me 🙂 .
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for an eight year old. He loves being independent fixing his snacks ( cutting cheese , cucumbers , etc. ) . It's safe for him to use .
customer_reviews.author: Georgette E Mobley

customer_reviews.title: Works just fine.
customer_reviews.text: Just got it today. It ships with out the cutting wire connected. Has two extra wire taped to the bottom of slab. No instructions. Not hard to figure out how to connect wire. Nice thing is that the c shaped cutting part holds both ends of the cutting wire so you can get the wire tight. Used it on some sharp cheddar. Got nice slices each time. I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: S. McAllister

customer_reviews.title: This is the best way to cut cheese.
customer_reviews.text: So easy to cut precise pieces of cheese, also to clean up an old block of cheese and save it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A.

customer_reviews.title: not an eye sore and looks nice
customer_reviews.text: it's a very nice cheese cutter. my wife likes how it's a marble base, it definitely doesn't look like a eye sore when it's on the counter tops. just wipe the wired cutter clean & all done. the base does have some weight on it so be careful when you accidentally drop it. other than that, my wife likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: No return?
customer_reviews.text: No good , received item chipped and cutting wire already broke says cant return
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Simple Slicing in Style
customer_reviews.text: This is such an elegant cheese slicer. I did have to adjust the wire a bit to get it centered but that was easy by tweaking the handle a bit. It makes slicing cheese SO easy!
customer_reviews.author: M.R.

customer_reviews.title: Stop struggling with a knife!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. After years of using a small, handheld cheese slicer the added marble base really makes things feel nicer. I didn't have any issues with a damaged product or broken wire, and am now somewhat beating myself up for not making the small investment in one of these bad boys earlier in life. I'd buy another in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: John Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made item, arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Glad I opened it as it was intended to be a gift. Tried to use the return/replace button since it was a prime item & it says the item isn’t eligible for return & only option is to “keep shopping.” Disappointed to say the least. 😒
customer_reviews.author: Trish M.

customer_reviews.title: Tried three orders all defective
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried ordering this 3 times. First one was cracked. Next two the wire was busted. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: fcyclist

customer_reviews.title: Use it for butter
customer_reviews.text: Cheddar from the fridge is too tuff for this,You get extra wires taped underneath got it 3 stars instead of one.
customer_reviews.author: jeff vandorn

customer_reviews.title: I recommend
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes I cut the cheese a little thick but that might be my bad 😂
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: breakable stone
customer_reviews.text: love it till I broke the stone part. my fault was by a towel and i pulled the towel. bought one more for my daughter in-law some where else and it was not as good.
customer_reviews.author: blanche

customer_reviews.title: Wire broken
customer_reviews.text: When this arrived, the wire was broken and unusable. They gave me 2 extra wires, thank goodness.
customer_reviews.author: TBock

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! This is exactly what I expected and works perfectly to cut all sorts of cheese.
customer_reviews.author: Torib423

customer_reviews.title: Appearance and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: The wire was cut in half when we received it . I then realized that it could not be returned. I am now down to one wire! Would you be kind enough to send me a replacement wire since I don't have a spare? Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Jo Mc

customer_reviews.title: Necessity for our kitchen
customer_reviews.text: We save money by buying our cheese in bulk and this slicer is perfect for making sandwiches, party platters, etc. We no longer buy American cheese--just the real stuff! It comes with 2 extra wires, and we have had our cheese slicer for over 3 years and are just now on our last wire. It is small and easy to store, and I have started purchasing these as gifts for others now!
customer_reviews.author: lilly's mommy

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice slicer. The extra cutting wires are a nice touch so put them where you won't lose them. The only limitation this slicer has is its size. If you have a large block of cheese, the slicer is limited by its wire length, approximately 5", so you will have to cut a large wedge into manageable sizes before hand.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Don’t do it
customer_reviews.text: Piece of crap. Wire broke on second slice of cheese-no replacements. Returned for refund
customer_reviews.author: ChrisD

customer_reviews.title: This product was damaged packed inside a shipping box not damaged at all..
customer_reviews.text: This product was damaged enough that just replacing a broken wire would not fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Carol from Jarrettsville

customer_reviews.title: Very beautiful item. I ordered it as a holiday present ...
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful item. I ordered it as a holiday present for myself. I ended up spending a lot of time trying to make this cheese slicer work and finally, gave up without cutting a single slice. Unfortunately, the wire just keeps coming off.
customer_reviews.author: Vi Kat

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't line up
customer_reviews.text: The handle is so messed up even after I bent it some more so it would line up properly. Not worth the time to return or replace.
customer_reviews.author: Braden

customer_reviews.title: cheese cutter
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a replacement of my old marble one that broke for several months. I had for over 30 years and was lost without it. After searching several dept stores, kitchen shops etc to NO avail, I decided to go to amazon. Found immediately. This is identical to my old one I love it would make a great gift, good price and did not mind the shipping charge. Thank you for the prompt service.
customer_reviews.author: gwen

product_meta.title: RSVP International White Marble Cheese Slicer & Cutting Board, 5" x 8" | Cut Cheeses, Meats, & Other Appetizers | Each Piece Unique in Marble Coloring | Cut & Slice with Elegance
product_meta.description: Color:White MarbleRsvp strives to offer quality kitchen products and cooking tools at competitive prices. Our white marble cheese slicer is a perfect example. An elegant way to slice and serve a variety of cheeses. Ideally sized for most cheeses, it measures 5-inches by 8-inches. Use it at your next wine and cheese party or just pamper yourself and enjoy it for everyday use. The stainless steel wire cutter makes perfect slices every time. Our clever design allows the wire to pass completely through the cheese into the groove below. Comes with 2 replacement wires. Replacement wires are also available separately. When all the right people, and ingredients, kitchen tools, and food come together, we call this the art of gathering.
feature_bullets: Made of beautiful natural marble with a stainless steel lever and wire cutter - each piece has a unique pattern and color
An elegant way to slice, cut and serve a variety of different cheeses - perfect for entertaining
Our clever design allows the wire to pass completely and efficiently through the cheese into the groove below ready for your party cheese plate
Measures 5-inches by 8-inches - comes with two replacement wires
